basics.name: Rajesh Narayanan
basics.label: Delivering IT Solutions with Business Acumen
basics.summary:
Experienced ICT Delivery Professional with 20+ years in consulting, engineering, and operations. Skilled in agile project management, delivery, observability, and pre-sales, with a proven track record in managing distributed teams and delivering enterprise-grade solutions.

Adept at meeting stringent SLAs across banking, telecom, finance, logistics, and healthcare domains. Strong expertise in managing cross-functional teams, stakeholder management and operational excellence. Seeking a dynamic environment that fosters creativity and continuous learning.

awards.title: Innovation using AI
awards.summary: Recognized for building unique AI powered app to strengthen and speed up support handover processes

awards.title: Knowledge Sharing Champion
awards.summary: Lauded as a knowledge sharing champion for presenting unique ways to build actionable data using no-code solution (AirTable).

awards.title: Bravo Award
awards.summary: Presented with appreciation award for exceptional project delivery and team leadership.

awards.title: Star Award
awards.summary: Best Team in Q4 of 2005-06 within Transportation & Services unit of an org of well over 100,000 employees.

work.summary: Designed and implemented API-first service model supporting Elastic Observability with 99.9% uptime.
work.name: Devoteam
highlights: Spearheaded the establishment of a Managed Services team for enterprise Elasticsearch, supporting organizations with combined annual revenues exceeding €16 billion, including leading players in retail and utilities sectors.

Integrated large language models (LLMs) to elevate the observability maturity model, driving a shift from proactive monitoring to fully automated incident detection and remediation, resulting in faster time to recovery of critical incidents.

Pioneered AI-first automation initiatives using Gemini and Google AI Studio, accelerating app development and reducing manual intervention enhancing team productivity and quality of delivered services.
Recognized at corporate event for rapid prototyping and deployment of project management utilities using Google AI Studio
Obtained intensive knowledge of both JIRA Project and Service Management products to effectively onboard and administer teams, ensuring delivery readiness and streamlined service delivery.

work.summary: Delivered both remote and on-site consulting and mitigated key operational issues of end customers.
work.name: Devoteam
highlights: Managed delivery of observability platforms for clients across Europe, leading to 40% improvement in troubleshooting times.
Guided RBAC and compliance solutions for enterprise clients, reducing incident MTTR by 35%.
Contributed to internal knowledge sharing initiatives and GenAI adoption for operational efficiency.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate ElasticSearch (ELK) observability with application performance insights.

work.summary: Setup observability solution for 24*7 globally available customer facing APIs and websites. Helped generate new business opportunities that delivered valuable cost savings for the client.
work.name: Infosys Limited
highlights: Delivered end-to-end application monitoring using AppDynamics, Grafana, and ELK for 24/7 uptime.
Developed Grafana dashboards for real-time monitoring and performance insights.
Maintained service SLAs above 95% for 3 consecutive years through effective incident handling.
Presented $400,000 in licensing cost savings through proactive vendor and architecture optimization.
Led agile teams of 20+ and coordinated with senior stakeholders for project delivery and reporting.
Managed enterprise e-commerce operations with consistent SLA compliance above 95%.
Led incident and problem management processes, including post-mortems.
Implemented lean processes reducing operational overhead by 10% while maintaining service quality.
Reported project performance to senior stakeholders through detailed dashboards.
Applied CI/CD standards to ensure reliable deployments.
Managed communications with vendors and remote teams.
Communicated directly with C-suite stakeholders during crisis situations.
work.summary: In-charge of a support project that comprised of all the customer-facing e-commerce applications for one of Europe’s largest logistics organisation.
work.name: Infosys Limited

highlights: Oversaw full SDLC of Java-based applications across geographies, managing 20+ developers.
Led agile delivery for distributed teams, implementing project governance and quality practices.
Delivered technical training and mentoring across logistics and retail sector engagements.
Managed people including under-performers.
Handled promotions as well as hiring decisions.
work.summary: IT delivery team lead, overseeing cross-functional globally distributed teams of 20+ software engineering professionals.
work.name: Infosys Limited

references.name: Shreedevi Ramesh, Co-Founder, Gurus360 Knowledge Services
references.reference: I know Rajesh since 2004, when I joined Infosys. While I did not manage Rajesh directly, he was a fresher part of my larger team for BNSF , on the same program. Rajesh was known for his dedication, accountability and his out of the box thinking. His Java skills and high code quality always ensured on time delivery. His calm, composed and mature attitude has taken him places over the years. He has excellent communication skills. With his sincerity and quest for learning he will always remain a value add to any team he is part of. I wish him the very best in all his future endeavors!

references.name: Anand Vijayakumar, Principal Customer Solutions Manager, Amazon Web Services (AWS)
references.reference: I have known Rajesh both professionally & personally for almost 14 years now. He is very sincere, professional, can communicate with everyone across the management spectrum effectively and manage projects from end to end. He has the ability to understand issues and identify the root cause to eliminate the problem instead of just identifying a workaround to get things moving. He is one of the most committed colleagues I have ever worked with. He would be an asset to Any team / Organization he joins..
